name: Super 8 Camrose

reviews.text: We travel to Camrose 3 times a year, it's always great to know we'll be staying at the Super 8! The staff make you feel so welcome, the rooms are spotless, and the complimentary breakfast is a great start to the day! Popcorn before bed, what more could you want!? The fitness room and pool area are a great bonus as is the location!
reviews.title: Always Happy to Come Back!

reviews.text: After being on the road for awhile staying at different places, we decided to spend the night in Camrose, at the Super 8. We were not disappointed. From the moment we walked in, it was very clean, and front desk staff made us feel welcomed and had us laughing.When we went to the room we were thrilled, so big and bright yet very cozy. Wished we had stayed and extra day the beds were very nice just wanted to stay and sleep.Breakfast was well presented, we did not feel crowded or in any one's way.Mall across the way was a bonus :o)Next time we plan on staying longer, and look forward to staying here again. Thanks!!!!
reviews.title: A Gem in our Travels

reviews.text: Our team stayed at several hotels and this was easily the nicest. A new, clean hotel with good facilities. The staff was excellent, from dealing patiently and efficiently with our 12:30 a.m. check in to answering questions to being helpful in guiding us to nearby amenities (Starbuck's, etc.) The pool and water slide are nice and well maintained. The complimentary continental breakfasts provide plenty of choices of decent food. It is very well set-up for sports teams as well as families.
reviews.title: Out-of-town soccer team enjoyed its stay

reviews.text: The housekeeping staff were outstanding, both friendly and efficient. We'll definitely be back!
reviews.title: Excellent facility!

reviews.text: I unfortunaly didnt get a very long stay here, but wish I did!
reviews.title: Great hotel - extremely clean, modern, great staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A refreshing stay at your Super 8. Lisa was great! Our hotel experience began when we called from Abbotsford to register for two nights. It was a class act all around! We booked our adult daughters into the room next to ours. The members of your staff were efficient. Every detail was met. We were in Camrose for a family funeral and it was special to be cared for with such great sensitivity. We would stay with you again in a heart beat and would recommend that others benefit from your excellent accomodations. The deluxe breakfast was truly deluxe and the Wednesday night guest appreciation meal hit the spot. Thanks for everything!!
reviews.title: Les with one "s"

reviews.text: We stayed in Feb 2011 for the Family Day Long Weekend. Probably the coldest weekend of the year. The staff were incredible, the rooms beautiful, and the continental breakfast was by far the best I've ever had.
reviews.title: Loved it

reviews.text: They also have a perfect sized pool and waterslide for the kids, a hot tub, and a fitness room. Being it was so cold outside, we didn't want to leave the hotel more than we had to, and this hotel is the perfect place to get stuck in with kids!
reviews.title: Amazing Stay

reviews.text: There's a breakfast room and lounging room, with a large TV and leather furniture. And a popcorn maker. Perfect place, we will happily book there again.
reviews.title: The Super 8 Camrose was great!

reviews.text: I was very impressed with the staff here and my stay. The breakfast was great and the staff had everything out and ready early and fresh. Check in and Check out were quick and smooth. On arriving I was upgraded to a better room and the room itself was clean and wonderful. The hot tub was great as was the water slide and pool. Both were very clean and tidy. If I am back in Camrose I will definitely staff here again.
reviews.title: Terrific!! Me & my kids love this place

reviews.text: My friends and I have stayed at this hotel a number of times now, all during the high season. We all travel quite a distance (two of us live on the East Coast of the US & the other lives in Michigan) for the Big Valley Jamboree every summer, and each time we’ve been there, we’ve been treated well. Check in and check out have been smooth and easy each time we’ve stayed there; the breakfast is great and having a small fridge in the room is very helpful.
reviews.title: Love it here!

reviews.text: The staff is always friendly and helpful, even with the hotel being at capacity for this holiday weekend. We always enjoy our stay here, and we are already looking forward to next summer!
reviews.title: Amazing Service

reviews.text: In a tough time with the passing of a family member, the staff at the Super 8 were so unbelievably accomadating. They made the process of making reservations easy and quick. The staff were all so friendly and understanding. The hotel is very beautiful and clean, just an all around great place to go. If you are coming to Camrose this is the only hotel I would reccomend. Great rates and a great stay. Thank you Super 8!!
reviews.title: Over priced

reviews.text: Very friendly front desk staff and clean rooms and public areas. Greatly appreciated the hot tub to warm up after a cold day outdoors on a construction proiect an hour away. Superstore across the street for food for lunches and gas very convenient, and many stores and restaurants within a five minute drive. Breakfast good, with quality coffee and real cream {hate creamer a personal beef}. Considerable discount for multiple night stays. Stayed one night in a King Suite which resembled a room in a much pricier property. Only thing that might be addressed is the TV set which is not flat screen, not a huge issue in my case but for someone that watches a lot of TV perhaps. Will be returning next week for another five night stay.
reviews.title: Great Extended Stays for Work

reviews.text: We stayed in one of the wheelchair accessible rooms & were very impressed not because we needed these facilities but we do have a sister that is in a wheelchair & know how hard it is for her to get around! Quite well done.
reviews.title: Great

reviews.text: Thanks for being Pet Friendly!! Rooms were nice and clean. Staff friendly and helpful. Fresh baked cookies in the evenings!! Breaskfast was not fancy but had enough options to keep most people satisfied. Heard the pool area was nice but did not go myself. Some noise from a furnace? it must have been in space underneath us...kind of sounded like a diesel truck running outside the window (but it was not). Was a little loud but got used to it as our furnace was running as well.
reviews.title: Nice!!

description: Close to Camrose Golf Course and Restaurants with Indoor Pool, Hot Tub and Fitness CenterOur Super 8 Camrose hotel offers value and convenience you can count on. Located just a short distance from the most popular attractions in the area, our non-smoking Camrose hotel offers time-saving amenities to help you get where you want to go.Start your morning with free SuperStart continental breakfast, or make coffee to go in your hotel room before you take to the road. Check out local sights with our free Wi-Fi. When you wish to take a break from sightseeing, you can work out in the gym, soak in the hot tub or splash in the heated indoor pool with waterslide. We are a pet-friendly hotel, and kids 17 and under stay free with an adult.
